pinyin: yi1 bu4 zuo4 , er4 bu4 xiu1
english: lit. either don't do it, or don't rest (idiom)

pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

pinyin_accented: yī rén dé dào , jī quǎn shēng tiān
pinyin_accented_tw: yī rén dé dào jī quǎn shēng tiān
